TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: k l iː s k oʊ s t ɛ l ɐ æ z k h ɜː t ə b ɹ ŋ ð s ɪ ŋ z w ɪ ð h ɜː f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t ɔːɹ s ɪ k s p uː n z ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ n oʊ p iː z f ɑːɹ θ ɪ k s l aɪ p s ʌ v b l uː tʃ iː z æ n d m eɪ b iː ɐ s n eɪ k f ɜː h ɚ b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b ɔː b w iː ɜː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k s n eɪ k æ n d ɐ b ɪ k t ɔːɹ f ɹ ɑː ɡ f ɔːɹ ð ə k iː z w iː k æ n s b uː k ð ə s ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t ʊ θ ɹ iː ɹ ɛ d b æ ɡ z æ n d w iː w ɪ l ɡ oʊ m iː t h ɚ w ɛ z d eɪ æ t ð ə t ɹ iː ŋ s t eɪ ʃ ə n
